name.en: Glacies the Snowmeister of Sacred Splendor
name.ja: <ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>麗<rt>れい</rt></ruby>の<ruby>凍<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>グラキエス

requirement.en: Send up to 6 other cards from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card's Level is increased by 1, and it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Then, you can shuffle up to 1 face-down card from your opponent's field into the owner's Deck for every 3 cards sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement.
